themes: use of tourism-related taxes and fines for arts funding
economic impact of arts and culture
redistribution of resources from large to small/lesser known artists
key_phrases: this MUST be done through a lens of equity--specifically racial equity
Quality of life outcomes in Austin are best predicted by race
People flock to Austin because of the culture and art
work more with HOT taxes and fines from Airbnb/VRBO owners
those events should also subsidize some of the smaller/lesser known opportunities and artists
barriers_identified: racial inequity in funding and quality of life outcomes
disproportionate support for large events over smaller artists
solutions_proposed: use data to inform decisions through a lens of racial equity
expand funding for arts and culture
allocate HOT taxes and fines from Airbnb/VRBO owners to support the arts
require large events to subsidize smaller/lesser known artists
